prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
## Additional Features and Notes

### Security
   Follow the Security Policy for reporting vulnerabilities.

### Developer Packages
   The library consists of multiple packages that can be installed either all at once or individually.

### Glossary of Terms
   Basic AI/LLM terms and core concepts related to Promptbook, including data management, pipeline control, media handling, and anomaly detection.

### Promptbook Engine
   Guidelines for when to use the Promptbook engine, known issues, and its limitations.

### Support & Community
   Contributions and feedback are welcomed to improve the Book language.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.rawPromptContent:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> ## Additional Features and Notes
> 
> ### Security
>    Follow the Security Policy for reporting vulnerabilities.
> 
> ### Developer Packages
>    The library consists of multiple packages that can be installed either all at once or individually.
> 
> ### Glossary of Terms
>    Basic AI/LLM terms and core concepts related to Promptbook, including data management, pipeline control, media handling, and anomaly detection.
> 
> ### Promptbook Engine
>    Guidelines for when to use the Promptbook engine, known issues, and its limitations.
> 
> ### Support & Community
>    Contributions and feedback are welcomed to improve the Book language.
